Address.label: Address
Address.value: 900 NORTH MICHIGAN AVENUE,SUITE 1100, CHICAGO, Illinois, 60611, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: GCM Grosvenor Inc is a global alternative asset management firm. It invests on behalf of clients who seek allocations to alternative investments, such as private equity, infrastructure, real estate, credit, and absolute return strategies. The company's offerings include multi-manager portfolios as well as portfolios of direct investments and co-investments. It also offers multi-client portfolios for investors who desire a turn-key solution for accessing alternative investments.
